Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Dark, olive-green to brown spots on leaves and fruit, lesions may be raised or sunken
Apple___Apple_scab.treatment: Apply fungicides (captan, myclobutanil), remove infected leaves and fruit, improve air circulation around trees
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Plant resistant varieties (Liberty, Enterprise), maintain tree health, proper spacing, avoid overhead irrigation

Apple___Black_rot.symptoms: Black, sunken lesions on fruit and leaves, cankers on branches, mummified fruit
Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Remove infected parts, apply fungicides (captan, thiophanate-methyl), sanitize pruning tools
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Prune properly to improve air flow, avoid overhead irrigation, clean orchard floor, remove mummified fruit

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.symptoms: Bright orange spots on leaves, yellow-orange spots on fruit, galls on cedar trees
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.treatment: Remove cedar trees within 2 miles, apply fungicides (myclobutanil) during bloom period
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Plant resistant varieties (Liberty, Enterprise), maintain distance from cedar trees, apply protective fungicides

Apple___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Apple___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Apple___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Cherry___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Cherry___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Cherry___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Cherry___Powdery_mildew.symptoms: White powdery spots on leaves and fruit, distorted leaves, reduced fruit quality
Cherry___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Apply fungicides (myclobutanil, trifloxystrobin), improve air circulation, remove infected parts
Cherry___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation, proper pruning for air flow, maintain plant health

Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_sp.symptoms: Gray to tan lesions with dark borders on leaves, lesions may coalesce, premature leaf death
Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_sp.treatment: Apply fungicides (azoxystrobin, pyraclostrobin), rotate crops, remove crop debris after harvest
Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_sp.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids, proper spacing, balanced fertilization, avoid continuous corn planting

Corn___Common_rust.symptoms: Reddish-brown pustules on leaves and stalks, powdery spores, reduced yield
Corn___Common_rust.treatment: Apply fungicides (azoxystrobin, trifloxystrobin) early in disease development, remove infected plants
Corn___Common_rust.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids, avoid late planting, maintain proper spacing, balanced nutrition

Corn___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal plant development
Corn___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Corn___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.symptoms: Long, elliptical gray-green lesions on leaves, cigar-shaped lesions, premature leaf death
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Apply fungicides (azoxystrobin, pyraclostrobin), rotate crops, till soil to bury residue
Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids, proper crop rotation, remove crop debris, avoid continuous corn

Grape___Black_rot.symptoms: Black, circular spots on leaves and fruit, mummified berries, cankers on stems
Grape___Black_rot.treatment: Apply fungicides (captan, myclobutanil), remove infected parts, improve air flow
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Prune properly, avoid overhead irrigation, clean vineyard floor, remove mummified fruit

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).symptoms: Dark spots on leaves, wood decay in older vines, tiger-stripe pattern on leaves
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).treatment: Remove infected vines, apply fungicides to pruning wounds, maintain vine health
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).prevention: Proper pruning techniques, avoid mechanical damage, use clean tools, maintain vine vigor

Grape___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Grape___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Grape___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.symptoms: Brown spots with dark borders on leaves, lesions may coalesce, premature defoliation
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.treatment: Apply fungicides (captan, mancozeb), remove infected leaves, improve air circulation
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.prevention: Improve air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation, proper pruning, maintain vine health

Peach___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Small, dark spots on leaves and fruit, angular lesions, shot-hole appearance
Peach___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides, remove infected parts, improve air circulation
Peach___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain tree health, proper spacing

Peach___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Peach___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Peach___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Pepper_bell___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Small, dark spots with yellow halos on leaves, water-soaked lesions, fruit spots
Pepper_bell___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides, remove infected plants, improve air circulation
Pepper_bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain plant health, proper spacing

Pepper_bell___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Pepper_bell___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Pepper_bell___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Potato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on leaves, target-like appearance, lower leaf infection
Potato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, mancozeb), remove infected leaves, improve air flow
Potato___Early_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, proper spacing, balanced fertilization, avoid overhead irrigation

Potato___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal tuber development
Potato___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Potato___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Potato___Late_blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems, white fungal growth in humid conditions
Potato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, mancozeb) immediately, remove infected plants
Potato___Late_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation, proper spacing, monitor weather conditions

Strawberry___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Strawberry___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Strawberry___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.symptoms: Dark brown spots on leaves, leaf edges turn brown, premature leaf death
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.treatment: Apply fungicides (captan, thiophanate-methyl), remove infected leaves
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.prevention: Improve air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation, proper spacing, maintain plant health

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Small, dark spots with yellow halos on leaves and fruit, water-soaked lesions
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.treatment: Apply copper-based bactericides, remove infected plants, improve air circulation
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain plant health, proper spacing

Tomato___Early_blight.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on lower leaves, target-like appearance
Tomato___Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, mancozeb), remove infected leaves, improve air flow
Tomato___Early_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, proper spacing, mulch soil, avoid overhead irrigation

Tomato___healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms, healthy green leaves, normal fruit development
Tomato___healthy.treatment: Continue current care practices, maintain regular monitoring schedule
Tomato___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper irrigation

Tomato___Late_blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems, white fungal growth in humid conditions
Tomato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, mancozeb) immediately, remove infected plants
Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation, proper spacing, monitor weather conditions

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surface, olive-green mold underneath, leaf curling
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, thiophanate-methyl), improve air circulation, reduce humidity
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Proper spacing, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain ventilation, reduce humidity

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with gray centers and dark borders, numerous spots per leaf
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, mancozeb), remove infected leaves
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation, remove crop debris, proper spacing, maintain plant health

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.symptoms: Yellow stippling on leaves, fine webbing, leaf drop, reduced plant vigor
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.treatment: Apply miticides (abamectin, spiromesifen), increase humidity, remove heavily infested leaves
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.prevention: Regular monitoring, maintain plant health, avoid drought stress, encourage natural predators

Tomato___Target_Spot.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings, similar to early blight, lesions on stems
Tomato___Target_Spot.treatment: Apply fungicides (chlorothalonil, mancozeb), remove infected leaves, improve air flow
Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, proper spacing, avoid overhead irrigation, maintain plant health

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.symptoms: Mottled yellow and green leaves, stunted growth, distorted leaves and fruit
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.treatment: Remove infected plants, control aphids, sanitize tools and hands
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Use virus-free seeds, control insect vectors, avoid tobacco use, sanitize equipment

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.symptoms: Yellow, curled leaves, stunted growth, reduced fruit set, whitefly presence
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.treatment: Remove infected plants, control whiteflies with insecticides
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties, control whitefly populations, use row covers, remove weeds
